sub_title: Strategic Business Analyst & Project Manager Open to Opportunities
summary:
I am a growing Strategic Manager and Entrepreneur with a passion for IT, innovation and change.

I have accumulated a diverse experience base in highly changing business areas such as Software Development, Website Development and Online Marketing, Hotel Projects and Hotel Management. I have also managed applications to EU grants.   

Managing in SME, starting-up small businesses (such as a Vintage Boutique Hotel) and leading change, have allowed me to develop my managerial and strategic skills while attaining an in-depth grasp of businesses and their layers, from strategy, finance and marketing to human resources and operations. 

Working with small teams and outsourced skills prompted me to develop new competences in order to close capability gaps, including Content Editing, Copywriting, Graphic Design and Interior Decoration, Wordpress, SEO, Google Analytics, Facebook Ads, and technical skills such as HTML, PHP, SQL, CSS, Flash and Webmastering.

The projects I have carried out took place in an international context having been developed in cooperation with professionals from Argentina, Philippines, China, India and Brazil, to name a few. It is within this context that I look forward to continue building my experience.
